metadata.title: CVE-2025-21519 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Security: Privileges).  Supported versions that are affected are8.0.40 and prior, 8.4.3 and prior and  9.1.0 and prior. Difficult toexploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network accessvia multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks ofthis vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 4.4 (Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
